vote.title: A public hearing to receive comments on proposed amendments to the City’s Property Assessed Clean Energy (“PACE”) Program Report which enables PACE financing of water conservation and energy-efficient improvements for private commercial, industrial, and multi-family properties within the city of Dallas pursuant to the Property Assessed Clean Energy Act, as amended (Texas Local Government Code Chapter 399); and, at the close of the public hearing, consider a resolution amending the City’s PACE Program Report previously approved on May 11, 2016, by Resolution No. 16-0721 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: A public hearing to receive comments on proposed amendments to the City’s Property Assessed Clean Energy (“PACE”) Program Report which enables PACE financing of water conservation and energy-efficient improvements for private commercial, industrial, and multi-family properties within the city of Dallas pursuant to the Property Assessed Clean Energy Act, as amended (Texas Local Government Code Chapter 399); and, at the close of the public hearing, consider a resolution amending the City’s PACE Program Report previously approved on May 11, 2016, by Resolution No. 16-0721 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
